attributes.action: Give Captain Tom Moore a knighthood
attributes.additional_details: Captain Tom Moore deserves a knighthood, for his continuing and  amazing effort to raise money for the NHS, during this difficult time. As I type this he is fast approaching his 100th birthday and has raised over £8 million for the NHS by walking around his garden 100 times while he recovers from a hip replacement
attributes.background: Give him a knighthood for showing true British grit in the country’s 2nd darkest hour. By raising millions for the NHS.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
